mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Challenge_participate (id, User_id, Challenge_id, participated_date) VALUES (0, #{userId}, #{challengeId}, now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Challenge_participate WHERE user_id = #{userId} and challenge_id = #{challengeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Challenge SET is_giveup = true WHERE User_id = #{userId} and Challenge_id = #{challengeId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Challenge_participate WHERE user_id = #{userId} and challenge_id = #{challengeId}

SELECT challenge.id as id, challenge.name as name, challenge.created_at as createdAt, challenge.start_at as startAt, challenge.finish_At as finishAt, challenge.description as description, challenge_participate.id as challengeParticipateId FROM challenge, Challenge_participate WHERE challenge.id = challenge_participate.challenge_id and challenge_participate.user_id=#{userId};
